StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetCountries]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SELECT STATE_CODE, COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION FROM GEO_LOCATION WHERE ((ISNUMERIC(LEFT(STATE_CODE,1))=0 AND ISNUMERIC(RIGHT(STATE_CODE,1))=0) OR (ISNUMERIC(LEFT(STATE_CODE,1))=1 AND ISNUMERIC(RIGHT(STATE_CODE,1))=0)) AND CITY_CODE=0 AND COUNTY_CODE=0 AND COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION IS NOT NULL ORDER BY COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION
